ModMetaData.name: Gravship Launch Windup
ModMetaData.author: Matathias
ModMetaData.description:
Changes gravship launches to require a windup period before you can launch. After windup, you have a small window to perform the launch, after which you will have to trigger the windup process again.
With this windup, launching a gravship is no longer a consequence-free eject button.
